mapper.sql: A.GUID, A.MASTERFK, A.OBJECTTYPE, A.OBJECTGUID, A.PRECEDENCE, A.OPERSELECT, A.OPERINSERT, A.OPERREVISE, A.OPERDELETE, A.OPEREFFECTIVE, A.OPEROBSOLETE, A.OPERRLS, A.OPERCHECKOUT, A.OPERCANCELCHKOUT, A.OPERCHGOWNER, A.OPERCHGID, A.OPERCHANGEMASTERNAME, A.OPEREXPORT, A.OPERIMPORT, A.OPERPREVIEWFILE, A.OPERVIEWFILE, A.OPERDOWNLOADFILE, A.OPERADDFILE, A.OPEREDITFILE, A.OPERDELETEFILE, A.OPERLINK, A.OPEREDITLINK, A.OPERUNLINK, A.OPERUNOBSOLETE, A.CREATEUSERGUID, A.CREATETIME, A.UPDATEUSERGUID, A.UPDATETIME
mapper.select: SELECT FROM SA_ACL_DETAIL A WHERE GUID=#GUID#
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO SA_ACL_DETAIL ( GUID, MASTERFK, OBJECTTYPE, OBJECTNAME, OBJECTGUID, PRECEDENCE, CREATEUSERGUID, CREATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME,
OPERSELECT, OPERINSERT, OPERREVISE, OPERDELETE, OPEREFFECTIVE,
OPEROBSOLETE, OPERRLS, OPERCHECKOUT, OPERCANCELCHKOUT, OPERCHGOWNER,
OPERCHGID, OPERCHANGEMASTERNAME, OPEREXPORT, OPERIMPORT, OPERPREVIEWFILE,
OPERVIEWFILE, OPERDOWNLOADFILE, OPERADDFILE, OPEREDITFILE, OPERDELETEFILE,
OPERLINK, OPEREDITLINK, OPERUNLINK, OPERUNOBSOLETE
) VALUES( #GUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #MASTERFK:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OBJECTTYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OBJECTNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OBJECTGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #PRECEDENCE#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#,
#OPERSELECT:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPERINSERT:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPERREVISE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPERDELETE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPEREFFECTIVE:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#OPEROBSOLETE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPERRLS:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPERCHECKOUT:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPERCANCELCHKOUT:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPERCHGOWNER:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#OPERCHGID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPERCHANGEMASTERNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPEREXPORT:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPERIMPORT:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPERPREVIEWFILE:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#OPERVIEWFILE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPERDOWNLOADFILE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPERADDFILE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPEREDITFILE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPERDELETEFILE:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#OPERLINK:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPEREDITLINK:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPERUNLINK:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPERUNOBSOLETE# )
mapper.update:
UPDATE SA_ACL_DETAIL
UPDATETIME=#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, UPDATEUSERGUID=#UPDATEUSERGUID#, MASTERFK=#MASTERFK#, OBJECTTYPE=#OBJECTTYPE#, OBJECTNAME=#OBJECTNAME#, OBJECTGUID=#OBJECTGUID#, PRECEDENCE=#PRECEDENCE#,
OPERSELECT=#OPERSELECT#, OPERINSERT=#OPERINSERT#, OPERREVISE=#OPERREVISE#, OPERDELETE=#OPERDELETE#, OPEREFFECTIVE=#OPEREFFECTIVE#,
OPEROBSOLETE=#OPEROBSOLETE#, OPERRLS=#OPERRLS#, OPERCHECKOUT=#OPERCHECKOUT#, OPERCANCELCHKOUT=#OPERCANCELCHKOUT#, OPERCHGOWNER=#OPERCHGOWNER#,
OPERCHGID=#OPERCHGID#, OPERCHANGEMASTERNAME=#OPERCHANGEMASTERNAME#, OPEREXPORT=#OPEREXPORT#, OPERIMPORT=#OPERIMPORT#, OPERPREVIEWFILE=#OPERPREVIEWFILE#,
OPERVIEWFILE=#OPERVIEWFILE#, OPERDOWNLOADFILE=#OPERDOWNLOADFILE#, OPERADDFILE=#OPERADDFILE#, OPEREDITFILE=#OPEREDITFILE#, OPERDELETEFILE=#OPERDELETEFILE#,
OPERLINK=#OPERLINK#, OPEREDITLINK=#OPEREDITLINK#, OPERUNLINK=#OPERUNLINK#, OPERUNOBSOLETE=#OPERUNOBSOLETE#,
WHERE GUID = #GUID#
